content: I add this extension but form doesn't show any difference. I am using version 23.0.0 @Paul Lynch
LHC-Forms does not yet support sdc-questionnaire-width. I suspect adding support would not be difficult, though. Is it something you need, or just something you were experimenting with?

I have three input fields. One is much wider than the other two. Now I put them into two separate rows. So it is a "better have" for my use case and the same for the extension "choiceColumn". My work around for choiceColumn is to manipulate the display text to have both code and display.
